name: Cindy Kutchey
text: What an amazing company. I called the after hours answering service and got a phone call back from the owner immediately. She was so calm and polite and helpful when I explained the change of flight time scenario when my son did not get on the scheduled shuttle. She went above and beyond helping my child get to the airport on time for his flight home. It's not often that you get a company that truly cares anymore and they were beyond wonderful.

resp.text: Cindy your kind review means the world to us! THANK YOU! We are honored to be a trusted resource for you and the entire UA parent community! We look forward to serving your son over his time at UA!

name: Sibyl Nyrene
text:
I had unusually great service from Scuttle Shuttle. My flight was cancelled due to unforeseen circumstances and they gave me credit for my new flight. Also, Gary, who picked me up was extremely pleasant and friendly.
There are many shuttles but why bother with another company when I got TOP Service! I will definitely use them again and I highly recommend them to anyone who wants great service!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Sibyl! We are so grateful for your kind words! Gary is such a valued member of our team and we look forward to sharing this review with him! We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: bea powell
text: Following our trip to Costa Rica our group was picked up at the Birmingham Airport headed to Tuscaloosa. Our driver, Mattie was an absolute delight. She had the best personality and made our one hour trip more enjoyable. Next time I use Scuttle Shuttle , I hope Mattie will be in the driver seat!!

name: Anna Arsenault
text:
Everything from the reservations, price, pick up, ride, and drop off is top notch. The convenience has been wonderful for my busy schedule.  I love being able to work on the road (they have WIFI) and not worry about driving to the airport.
If you are looking to take some stress off of your travel- I highly recommend using Scuttle Shuttle!

name: Billy Kirkpatrick
text: I took Scuttle Shuttle home from a late night flight.  The service was excellent.  Driver was nice and friendly, the shuttle was clean and we got back to Tuscaloosa safely.  I highly recommend them.  I had a text and a phone call from the driver as soon as I landed to make sure I found her.  Great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for your awesome review Billy! We are thrilled to hear you received excellent service!

name: Ali B
text: Maddie was an excellent driver. She greeted us upon arrival, on time I should add, and made sure our luggage was taken care of. Having Elf on the TVs was also a huge plus!

resp.text: Hi Ali! We thank you for your review and the kind words about Maddie! She is a valued member of our team and we are so glad to know she offered you excellent service! We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Amelia Stanley
text: the GOAT when it comes to transportation service. the most amazing staff, super responsive and on-time every time i have used them. which has been like 10 times. mattie and gary are my favorite drivers. you can tell that they love their job. van is always spotless and comfortable.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review Amelia! We are thrilled to hear that you have experienced consistent, professional and friendly service! We look forward to continuing to serve you!

name: Staci Picaro
text: DRIVERS ARE AMAZING AND PROFESSIONAL! SAFE AND KNOWLEDGABLE OF THE ROAD WAYS AND TRAFFIC PATTERNS WHICH IS KEY GIVEN ALL THE MAJOR CONSTRUCTION! THIS IS WHO YOU WANT YOUR STUDENT RIDING WITH....PERIOD. CUSTOMER SERVICE IS OUT OF THIS WORLD!

resp.text: Staci you are so right! The roads in Tuscaloosa and Birmingham are certainly a bit crazy due to the long term construction projects going on! We take pride in doing our job to the highest standards in the industry! Thank you for your kind review! We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Isabelle (Bella) Evans
text: I have LOVED every experience I have had with Scuttle Shuttle; being a busy senior I have used them three times this semester (so far) when traveling for graduate school interviews. However I am SO SAD to see the price increase for the service. As a student who pays for my travel, $149 for a round trip is quite a stretch budget wise. I am truly disappointed with this, and will have to seek out an alternative airport transportation for the Spring semester as I cannot afford the price tag.

resp.text:
Thank you Isabelle for your review and feedback!

We did have to adjust our pricing due to the extensive impact road construction in both Birmingham and Tuscaloosa has had on our driving time and on the wear and tear of our shuttle vehicles. We’ve also had to prepare for the new Alabama gas tax.

Another important factor is that we find it important to pay our drivers a liveable wage and in doing so retain our strict no-tipping policy. After much consideration we decided we would not use the added expense to our operations as an excuse to cut employee pay. Instead we decided to forge ahead knowing we have built a reputation of excellence with hope that our customers value our stance as a company.

We have set out from the very beginning to be servants of our community and to be a responsible, fair employer. Our vision was to model how to build a local business that is truly focused on employee well-being and excellence in service. And while it does cost more to operate in this fashion, we believe wholeheartedly it is crucial that we provide a safe, professional service to the Tuscaloosa and UA community and we do so by using top-notch staff. It is our sincere hope that UA students find themselves one day employed by a company who shares our values.

We are proud to say that we are still half the cost of ride-shares with the benefit of knowing that every driver on our team is a direct employee who has been thoroughly vetted and FBI-screened.

Thank you again for sharing your feedback with us! We do hope you’ll ride with us again find value in knowing that not only will you continue to receive excellent service but your fare doesn’t go in a huge corporation’s pocket. It stays right here in the Tuscaloosa community.

name: Exadigital Services
text: It's the ONLY shuttle service I would trust as a UA parent! We tried another cheaper service and they didn't show up. Caused my daughter to take a $140 Uber. We will only use Scuttle Shuttle from now on. If you do a bit of digging you will find that the interstate in this area is very dangerous. There is also a TON of construction in Tuscaloosa and Birmingham. Personally, this is a service you shouldn't skimp on. You get what you pay for. Scuttle Shuttle drivers have been safe and professional every time. I will never stray again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We definitely strive to be the best in the business and pride ourselves on being a fair and responsible employer! We look forward to continuing to serve you and your student!

name: Owen Connolly
text: Departed and arrived on time. Smooth trip and slept the whole way. Would take again.

resp.text: We really appreciate your review Owen! One of the best things about trusting us with the driving is getting to snooze on the trip! We are glad to know you were comfortable and look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Paul Blue
text: The communication was good, the arrival was prompt, and we got to the airport right when was expected. Couldn't ask for more

resp.text: Thank you for your review Paul! We are thrilled to know you had a great experience with us! That's what it is all about! Thank you for letting us serve you!

name: Sarah Morrison Bell
text: Very convenient and Awesome customer service! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Sarah! We are thrilled to hear from you!

name: Nina Hensley
text: I book this service for my college student up to two times a month and have ALWAYS had great experiences. My daughter refuses to ride with anyone else. She is on a first name basis with many of the drivers. You cannot go wrong with Scuttle Shuttle. They will bend over backwards to assist you and make you feel confident in safety. I like that their vans are clearly labeled and their drivers are employees who wear professional uniforms. We absolutely love Scuttle Shuttle and all that they stand for and the fact that they are locally founded, owned and operated. The employees are all so friendly and happy so that says a lot about how stellar this company is from the inside out.

resp.text: Hi Nina and thank you for your kind words! We make every effort to treat our employees well and to provide excellent service. We are so glad to know you received the level of service we always strive to offer! Safety is a top priority for us and we are so glad that you and your daughter have been comfortable with our service! We look forward to serving you and your daughter in the future!

name: Megan Rykaczewski
text: Excellent service! This is perfect for students at breaks and parents visiting but also for FOOTBALL! Out of towners and visiting fans will love the easy ride right to campus from the Birmingham airport - BHM is the closest airport to Tuscaloosa with several direct flights and with a direct ride right to Tuscaloosa you’ll be near the stadium and the action in no time! Friendly, professional, no tipping and safe- plus WiFi! Watch other games on your tablet while you ride!

name: Tricia Stone
text: Emergency situation when colleagues flight from Houston to bham was delayed. Called SS after hours. Followed their instruction to text if reservation was less than 24 hours. After an hour they texted back “what time”. When I answered absolutely no answer but when I complained I got a ton of text from them defending their position. So. If you have a reservation or need one during normal business hours call in advance. If it is an emergency rely on Uber because they only respond as a courtesy unless you complain and then will put you in your place. Very rude about how their employees “go home”. So hope your flights arrive before 4:30.

resp.text:
Ms. Stone,

We apologize that we were unable to accept a last minute reservation at 7:30pm for that same night. Our outgoing voicemail message explains that we will return texts, calls and voicemails when we return to the office (which at 7:30pm would be the next business day). Our website also explains that we will attempt to assist with last minute reservations but that a customer would need to call our office for assistance. We are able to help with last minute requests quite often but our office does close at a normal hour and our employees do go home to their families.

Like many service based businesses, we are a “by reservation” model. Texts that come in at 7:30pm aren’t immediately noticed because our administrative employees are at home or attending to their life outside the office at this hour. If you have a reservation with us and your flight is delayed or there is any sort of emergency, we employ a 24/7 answering service who calls out to an on-call manager. However, if you do not have a reservation, text in to ask for one last minute, and take 30 minutes to respond to answer us when we attempted to assist you at 7:30pm (as a courtesy) we may find ourselves unable to assist you.

We understand that you were frustrated and trying to make very last minute arrangements. We get it. But our logs indicate that two different staff members interacted with you yesterday evening up until around 9:15pm. Sadly, your behavior towards them over text was rude, demanding, and downright disrespectful. We have a strict policy to protect the well-being of our staff. And while posting your texted responses to our well-meaning staff who attempted to respond to your concerns after-hours would be unprofessional on our part, we are confident that it would be more of a reflection of your character than any lack of service on our end.

We have wonderful employees  They DO indeed leave our office and go home to their lives. And as their employer, we respect their time at home with their families. It would be unreasonable for us to expect them to drop everything to make a reservation for the same night when you respond with the time you needed at 8:17pm. We would need to refer any potential customers who do not share our values about how we speak to and treat our staff to another provider. We apologize that we weren’t able to assist you in a situation that clearly frustrated you. If you’d like to email us at request@scuttleshuttle.com we will be happy to provide you a gift card to the ride-share service of your choosing. But as for Scuttle Shuttle, we stand behind our amazing staff and employ professional boundaries and would need to ask that you use an alternate provider.

Have a great day and Roll Tide Roll!

name: Michelle Coutsaftis-O'Neal
text:
I want to send a big shout out and “thank you” to Scuttle Shuttle. I travel to the west coast on business at least once per month. My flights are horrendously early so I typically take the 3:00 am shuttle to BHM. Scuttle Shuttle offers several safe pickup locations around Tuscaloosa and I have never been left waiting around. Usually the driver is there before I even arrive for the pickup. I love that they text you when they are on the way to your location. Then once the driver arrives the real experience begins. These shuttle drivers are the most courteous and friendly people I’ve ever come in contact with using a transportation service. They always greet me with a smile, open and close doors for me and load luggage. Once in the shuttle the driver always asks about my comfort. I’ve noticed they are also very perceptive about if I’m in a talkative mood and want conversation or if I’m still sleepy and needing some quiet time to prepare for a day of travel.  This may seem like a small thing but at 3:00 am it is much appreciated.

Travel to the airport is comfortable in the clean vans and I have always arrived on time. Now, while we’ve never encountered traffic issues, I can see that could happen but rest assured this company will do all they can to get you to the airport on time. I arrive at the airport steps from entrance, having received my luggage from a friendly driver and I’m ready to begin my day.

On two recent trips on United we experienced significant travel disruptions - like a cancelled flight, severely delayed flight and a diverted flight. On both occasions I missed my shuttle pickup time. Lauren, Cory and Alison from the Scuttle Shuttle office were so patient and kind while I was a nervous wreck trying to figure out how to get home. Cory arranged a new reservation for me within minutes of taking my call. To experience such great customer service after dealing with massive travel headaches all day guaranteed that I will continue to use Scuttle Shuttle for airport transportation.

I could go on and on about this company. In short, I think it is quite rare to experience such consistently awesome service from a company nowadays. You can be assured of a safe, pleasant and stress free transportation experience with Scuttle Shuttle. Give them a try! You will not be disappointed.

resp.text: What a pleasure it is to serve you Michelle! Thank you for your review and for giving us the opportunity to make your travels just a little less stressful! That's what it is all about! We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with our Scuttle Shuttle team. We are so proud of our crew!

name: Noel Sarver
text: Met all expectations

name: ania webb
text: great service

resp.text: Thanks for your review Ania! We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Will & Kate P
text: Exceptional service! It was my wife's and mine anniversary. Hunter was professional and courteous. We could not and have not had a better experience with a limousine service. Thanks Hunter would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us be a part of your anniversary evening! Thank you for the review!

name: ted schmidt
text: William responded to every request very quickly and professionally.  He was early and treated us all to a red carpet service!  Highly recommend William and Hunter  Livery....Top shelf!

resp.text: Mr Schmidt, so glad you and your family enjoyed the evening! Thank you so much for the positive review!

name: L Graddick
text: Great veteran owned company! Made the rental experience worth going back.

resp.text: Thank you, Mr Graddick, for taking the time to leave us a review and especially thank you for the 5 star review! It was a pleasure to serve you and your family at the wedding!

name: Tommy Vaughan
text: Wonderful experience with Hunter Livery. Totally professional well-dressed driver and on time for each pickup and drop off. It's nice to see a business go the extra mile for you. Will be calling Hunter again for our next "night out on the town" in Mobile, Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you Mr Vaughan for the 5 star review, we look forward to serving your future business travel needs!

name: Sam Pomier
text: This place has amazing customer service!  Very professional and prompt in communication. Would highly recommend to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to serve you at your wedding! Thank you for the 5 star review, we wish you the best!

name: Marcie Edwards
text: Hunter Livery is awesome. Their vehicle fleet is well maintained. Their drivers are always polite, punctual, and professional.  And, they always go above and beyond to take care of their clients!  I highly recommend their services.

resp.text: Mrs Edwards,  Thank you for your review, it was a pleasure serving you at the wedding! We look forward to any opportunity to serve you in the future!

name: Daniel Nichols
text: My wife and I used Hunter Limousine on our wedding day to get her and her bridesmaids from Mobile to the Grand Hotel, then on to Oak Hollow Farm. All I can say is William is a class act and we could not have asked for better service. He was extremely professional, timely, courteous and also helpful when we needed to add additional services. I highly recommend.

resp.text:
Mr Nichols,

Thank you for allowing us to be a part of your wedding, and thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your experience!

name: John Wolf
text:
TLDR: Double booked my wedding car after assuring me it was available.

I booked the 1950 Chevy as a wedding get-away car over a month ago, after calling to confirm availability because I knew there were a lot of weddings our particular weekend in Mobile. After confirming the availability, I immediately booked online as I felt more secure using the online portal to give payment information. I was assured the vehicle and driver would be in place at least thirty minutes before pickup.

I received a call 9 days before the wedding from the owner, informing me that they had another reservation earlier that night, and he didn't think the timing would work out.  I find it exceptionally unprofessional that the booking was confirmed beforehand (the online booking portal specifically requires a confirmation). No bride expecting a vintage automobile as a getaway will ever be satisfied with an Escalade as an alternative.

name: Jonathan Bolson
text: Punctual Professional service, with a beautiful fleet to choose from

resp.text: Thank you, Mr Bolson, we are glad you were happy with the service and look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Rachel
text: They were great. On time, clean, and kind. Easy to reschedule as well.

name: John Naegeli
text: We used Coastal Express between PNS and Orange Beach. Tommy picked us up on time for both arrival and departure with friendly and welcoming service.  They provided excellent customer service keeping us updated well in advance assuring us we were covered. Highly recommend Coastal Express on your visit to the Orange Beach area.

name: Francis Wendowski
text: Great experience from booking through pickups in both directions. We were coming from out of state and the ease of this transaction alleviated much of my stress booking for a party of 14 people ages 3 to 77 ---- will definitely book with Coastal Express again

resp.text: Thank you, Francis.  We enjoyed being a part of your family vacation. We look forward to seeing you again in 2022!

name: Jacob Miller
text: I used Coastal Express as part of a group/conference arrangement for travel between PNS and Orange Beach. My entire encounter with the company was completely positive - I was contacted to schedule my pickup, received reminders and updates via text about times and places to meet, and the drivers were not only on-time but actually a little early traveling in both directions.

name: Debi Verrill
text: Our driver was there to pick us up within 5 or so minutes of our leaving the airport, once we'd landed.  He was pleasant and helpful and the ride was nice without incident.  We would definitely use Coast Express again.  Thanks so much!

resp.text: Thank you, Debi! We appreciate the feedback and look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Hannaha Niles
text: Great experience! Driver was on time and very professional.

name: Cliff Stepp
text: Would highly recommend this company.  On time, very professional, great communication.  Driver Brian was very pleasant and the vehicle was clean.  Great experience.

resp.text: Cliff, thank you so much for the feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Keali Myrick
text: We booked a driver earlier this morning around 9-9:15 after another service had cancelled on us. We had to leave our place by 10:00. They assured us it would be a fairly low rate, they would be on time to get us at 10:30 and everything was working out perfectly. We were in contact with the driver and everything. Then around 10:30 we received a phone call from them saying that there was a 6 passenger minimum, after I had already told them there was 2 of us when I booked the car, and told us there would be an up charge and would charge us $30 a person. To add on, they then informed us that our driver now wouldn’t be here until 11:30-11:45. This is poor customer service and they practically blamed us for the miscommunication and their faults in this process. We are just lucky we aren’t supposed to be heading to the airport! Not happy!

resp.text: Keali, we apologize for your booking experience and that our dispatcher quoted you an inaccurate price and pick up time initially.  We constantly work to meet our customers' expectations and apologize for falling short of yours.  We would appreciate the opportunity to regain your business.

name: Coastal Car Rental
text: Excellent service. Our customers use this service to bring them to rent cars and they are very dependable and honest. Recommend this service to everyone!

resp.text: Thanks for the review. We enjoy working with your car rental company.

name: Sam Brumberg
text: Dee was a great driver and conversationalist. She did a great job navigating, pointing things out, and was timely and professional.

resp.text: Thank you, Sam. We are happy that you enjoyed your ride.

name: Caroline Woods
text: Amazing service, amazing drivers, great southern hospitality couldn't ask for a better shuttle. I definitely recommend these people. Especially for an airport shuttle they are top dollar

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words!  We appreciate our customers so much!

name: Zack Seltzer
text: Kathy is the most amazing driver! Would recommend using them especially for hangout weekend!

resp.text: Thanks for the review. We strive to provide the most reliable and cost efficient service on the gulf coast.

name: Jade Goforth
text: Awful service! We were waiting for 2 hours and we keep calling and they said they were closer and close so we ended calling up canceling and getting another taxi service instead who came 10 mins later! Don't really recommend them.....

resp.text: The reviewer called our dispatcher at 8:51 p.m. and was told the company was pre-booked with a wedding  and bachelorette party until 10 p.m.  The reviewer agreed to wait until after 10 p.m. and then called our dispatcher at 10:11 p.m. and cancelled the request. The dispatcher told the reviewer at 10:11 p.m. the driver would be there in less than 5 minutes and the reviewer became rude and hung up the phone. The reviewer was made aware of the wait at the original phone call and agreed to wait. The reviewer was most likely inebriated and became  impossible to satisfy.

name: Alexandria Adams
text: Called to try and get a taxi ride, was going over details with friends and asked how long it will take to get to us, as we were looking at other ride services trying to find the fastest route. He cussed at me and hung up in my face. Went with lyft instead and had a much better experience

name: Erica Asble
text: Our driver was super nice, picked us up even though we were staying in the not so tourist part of town on a busy night. Give them a call first, and if there is a wait. I suggest to take it they we be there, and won't give you the "I'll be there in 15......" an hour later your still waiting...

name: Tommy Miller
text: Whatever man works customer service should be fired instantly. I didn’t know the address of where we were going and I asked for a second to look it up and he said “oh my god....” then hung up. Once Uber and Lyft reach this town, good luck.

name: Christy Czapla
text: Best taxi service in the area!!! These guys are AMAZING!!! They arrived with smiles and on time. Could not ask for better service. I HIGHLY recommend. I manage a hotel in the area and my guest and I always use Modern Taxi. We know we won't be disappointed. Thank you so much for always being there and providing top notch service! :)

name: Wes Fulgham
text: These guys are the best taxi service that I have ever used!  I live in a college town and I use taxis all the time, but I have never come across a company like this!  They are super responsive and always on time.  They even give great advice for restaurants and bars!  If you need a taxi... only call them.  You will love them as well.

name: Spenser Frank
text: Reserved the party bus and MAN was it a fun night! The new look with the fresh interior was awesome! The limo wrap seating had us all able to laugh and talk and we almost forgot we were en route to the bars! Great night! Quality service! Love them!

name: Jennifer Daniels
text: I love this taxi service!!!!! During our stay we had woman, named Haley, and she was fantastic. Take us where we needed to go and very helpful the following day with recommending places to go and taking us there. Always on time. Her boyfriend is a driver as well and we enjoyed our time with!!! You guys are great! I HIGHLY reccommend them.

name: Allisa Belcher
text:
Brian was awesome. He was able to tell us where all the awesome places were in Gulf Shores. He picked us up from our condo,
Brought us to dinner, then to another bar and then home. Brian was nothing but pleasant to talk to the entire time. Such great customer service! Another plus is he is a retired serviceman! Support our veterans!

name: Paul Saputo
text: We called this guy, he promised to come to pick us up in 30 minutes. He didn't come and never answered the phone again. As it turns out, we found out from people that he has this reputation. If you have less than 4 people he will promise to pick you up and then not come.

name: Nicholas Crownover
text: My boyfriend and I had an amazing time thanks to Modern Taxi.  They were prompt and attentive and always on time.  Thank you so much to Haley and Steve our two favorite drivers.

name: matt long
text: Great service. These Guys come highly recommend and now I see why. Thank you.

name: Jon Blough
text: I've used Brian and Haley several times. Awesome awesome cab. Very helpful on where to go and what to do in Gulf shores.

name: sarah hunter
text: Awesome...thanks Haley...great service..come on guys share..honest dependable and tolerate of Dog...

name: B Chev

text: Always fast and professional!  I always choose Modern!

name: Connie Drake
text: What a rip off used this service to go from Gulf Shores to floraBama this weekend and was ripped off driver didn't even run the Meter state's it was broke 45$ for 2 people !! Won't use this company again !!! There meters are over calculated it's a scam company!

resp.text: Our rates go by the stated rates posted in our taxis.  I am sorry if you feel that you were over charged.  But none of our meters are broken so you may have taken another company.

name: Jason Thomas
text: Rip off

name: Majestic Jamaica
text: Horrible Taxi Service, and Racist!

name: Katie Engle
text: Well, when my friend and I first called a very nice gentleman answered the phone and told us our cab would be at our hotel in 10 minutes. A half an hour went by and nothing- it had started to rain so we decided to call back and see if we could cancel because we were wanting to go the beach but it had started raining, plus he was 20 minutes late. The gentleman answered and said something along the lines of "yes you can cancel I totally understand! If you need a cab just call us back!" Then the next day my friend and I decided again to call this cab service and order another cab, well, wrong decision. The guy answered the phone again and was super nice, he told us our cab would be here in 45 minutes! So we got ready for the beach and headed outside to sit in front of our hotel and wait for him.. We should've waited inside (it's so hot here lol.) So anyway, it gets to be where he's 40 minutes late, so me and my friend are like "He's probably just in a ton of traffic let's just go wait in the hotel lobby!" So we sit there for probably an hour. (Yes I know, we should've just called a different service, but we had already ordered this one and I had felt bad because we had to cancel the day befores cab.) Anway, we called the service to ask about when he would be here because he was almost two hours late at this point, NO ANSWER. We kept waiting, we kept calling. NO ANSWER. At one point the phone had the busy signal which leads me to believe they were ignoring our phone calls. THIS CAB SERVICE NEVER SHOWED UP AND NEVER ANSWERED OUR CALLS. DO NOT USE THIS CAB SERVICE.

name: Rylee Krimmer
text: No one at this establishment knows how to answer a phone? I had ordered a cab a few days ago that never showed up. Then today I ordered another and it's well over an hour late. No one will pick up the phone so I can cancel. Literally use any other cab service.

name: Corinne Cane
text: Cool guy. Would ride again

name: Susan Smith
text: Can't beat the price considering the driver waited on me to do my shopping so that I didn't have to wait until another cab came available to get home. The most kind and good spirited driver I've ever encountered in using taxi service, certainly better than my experiences with mellinium taxi. I'll definitely be using mercury taxi from now on.

I've seen it enough out of drivers for this company to know these are NOT isolated incidents. Apparently management must approve of their violent, lawless behavior.

name: Brianna Broome
text: Cab service tried to rep me a new one, they sorry as hell and they are scam artists. Was using them for a ride every where I go until they gave me some bs driver. Who tried to over charge me. Called dispatch no luck

name: Mr. John Martin
text: They take forever to show up

name: Angie Yao
text:
The dispatch lady was rude and unfriendly. She cuts me off when I try to give her my information. She didn't ask me if I have any questions and simply hung up. I had no idea when they'll be here, who is the driver, or how much it would be.
I called after 30 mins, she said another 10 mins.
After an hr, the lady told me my driver has a customer and won't be here for another 30 mins. I need to be at the airport in the next 20 mins to catch my flight, she told me there's no way and told me to get uber.
So I missed my flight because of the wrong estimated arrival time/lack of update. And I missed many important meetings with clients. Who is going to compensate my loss?

I got a little nervous when no one had called at 4:25 so I called them. The dispatcher said, "oh, only 2 drivers came in this morning so we can't send anyone out." No warning, just left me stranded at the very last minute with no time to arrange another ride. If you need to get someplace on time (like the Chattanooga airport for a 6AM flight), I would look elsewhere

name: Bruce Clements
text: I have tried using these guys twice now, and it has been a disaster both times.  I am local in Chattanooga, so I know when I am being taken the long way, but it doesn't matter to these crooks.  I park exactly 2.2 miles from the airport on Shallowford Rd when I fly out .  I got a cab from the airport one evening , told the driver where we were going, and he acted like he didn't know where that was (he did), and as I was giving him directions, he intentionally took a wrong turn down 153, and then down I75N despite me asking repeatedly to turn around on Lee Hwy, and then got on Shallowford at Hamilton place, and drove all of the way back on Shallowford, all the while trying to act like he didn't understand what we were telling him.  Even when we were telling him to turn left or right, and would point and say, "turn left here?" and turn right at the same time.  He was 100% American, and English was his only language, he was just that shady.  The second time was two nights ago, three of us loaded our stuff into a cab, and when the driver found out where we were going, he said, "it's $5 per person, which is $5, $5, and another $10.  It's $20."  I said, "There are three of us, we are going two miles down a main highway with no traffic, and how does $5 times three make $20?".  He was kind enough to say, "It's $20, or you can get your stuff out".  We took Uber instead, and always will from now on.  Cab companies hate Uber because they are going to have a shred of common decency to stay in business now, and it's apparently something they cannot do.

I asked him if he uses the meter in his cab, he just told us to get our stuff out of his cab.  We did, he then just got in the van and drove off.  Not me or anyone else I know will ever be using Mercury Cab, ever again.  Driver was obviously out to scam people.  It's a shame that Mercury has gone downhill so bad.  I guess Uber and similar companies have killed the taxi business, but it may be for be for the best after our last experience.  ** I wish there was a score lower than 1 star**

We had a 2 hour drive to the restaurant we chose for the evening and decided it would be so nice to have a limo take us so we could enjoy our time together. When the limo came and we entered into the limo the car was disgusting. Apparently they had taken prom students over the weekend and our date was on Tuesday. It seems no one could clean the car between the the 2. The radio was broken the windows were all smeared up, glitter all over and the floors had mud on them. There was a knife with cake icing on it sticking out of the seat which in turn got icing on my dress. The driver was okay and drove very well  but the car was absolutely horrible. We were tempted to just cancel and drive ourselves but we had paid ahead of time and were afraid we wouldn’t get our money back.

name: G Brown
text:
Prestige Limo truly provides a world class service.  i have not needed a limo or car service in the Tuscaloosa area sadly for a while, since my Mama's death, but I am now booking several trips for a happy occasion - my nieces wedding!
After contacting Prestige Limo of Tuscaloosa for wedding car service arrangements I remembered I wanted to review and recommend Prestige based on my prior experiences with them.
My first experience with Prestige was when I needed a car service late night and last minute trying to get to Hale County from Birmingham Airport as my Mama was dying. I texted Prestige from my emergency flight from Mexico and Barry, the owner, was beyond compassionate and professional, and had a great driver waiting on me.
The car was immaculate but more importantly, was there early, and both the owner and driver so sensitive to my situation. The driver told me when we were nearing my Mother's house to just get out and run in and he would bring everything inside, which he did.  I literally do not know if I would have gotten all the way down to my Mother's house that night without Prestige.
I had the same professional experience booking today for my niece's pre wedding events and look forward to using Prestige for the wedding as well. I have traveled all over the world, had my own driver for years in NYC, but have never had a better car service experience.  Thank you Prestige.

name: kristine
text: The Prestige team has driven me more than 60 times this past year and has continued to exceed all my expectations on each trip. Mr. Fields (the owner) and his team are professional, pleasant, courteous, and safe drivers. They arrive on time, are up-to-date on any possible traffic delays with alternate routes ready, and know their client preferences (e.g., unique pick-up or drop-off locations; interior temperature; music, etc.). The team also are cognizant of any flight issues whether going to or leaving the airport. Several of my flights this past year have been delayed and I have been able to text/email/call to reschedule without further delay but in most cases, as soon as I knew of the schedule disruption, I received a text from the driver that they knew of the change already and would be there waiting for me as soon as I landed. Mr. Fields also is a wealth of assistance for transportation needs outside Alabama and has a network of colleagues with whom he can instantly connect you with. For example, when trying to get back to Alabama when a major airline had multiple disruptions and left thousands of travelers stranded in Atlanta, he was able to text within minutes of my request the names and numbers of several local companies who could get me back home. I appreciate this level of consistent service. Such proactive problem-solving and communication put me at ease knowing that my ride would be there – no matter how late the flight would arrive. I have made several last-minute requests (e.g., forgot to reserve a ride; had a game day request) over the year and they were able to accommodate them. The evening before each reservation, I receive an email confirming the pick-up time which is a helpful reminder and an opportunity to make any changes. I also receive a text or call from the driver a few minutes before each pick-up. That way, I know who to expect, if there will be any delays (never have been), or other changes in my reservation. Making a reservation with Prestige is easy to do with drop-down menus on my computer or phone. Also, the Prestige transportation fleet is clean and new with multiple options for any occasion. I have recommended Prestige to my colleagues and friends. Prestige offers an exemplary array of 24/7 services of which I will continue to use – in fact I already have multiple future reservations confirmed. Prestige, Mr. Fields, and his team are a true asset to those who need quality, safe, cost effective, and friendly transportation services.

name: Bryan Greenwald
text:
I I had to plan a three day business trip to Birmingham, Alabama.  Having never been there, I was not interested in having to drive between different locations and risk getting lost and being late to meetings.  I found Alabama Sedan on the internet, and reached out to them via email.  Michael called me shortly thereafter and when I explained the various car rides I would require, he was careful to check his calendar to make sure he could accommodate me.
During the trip, Michael was very professional.  He always arrived early- including at the airport, at the hotel, and at the meeting locations.  He was always considerate to text me that he had arrived, but that there was no rush.  And most importantly, he did a great job planning the pickup times that would allow me to arrive at my destination in a timely manner.  There was one trip for which Michael was not available (and for which he had warned me in advance) and the person he arranged as backup was equally professional.
I don’t plan on returning to Birmingham in the near future, but if I do the first thing I will do is arrange to use Alabama Sedan again.  I would not hesitate to recommend them to anyone who needs car transportation in that area.

name: Steven Mccornack
text: The negative review ("they never picked us up and we missed our plane") is FAKE!!!  I have used Alabama Sedan for TWO YEARS now - more than TWO DOZEN TIMES - and EACH and EVERY time they are EARLY!!  Their service is SUPERLATIVE: A+++.   They text me updates for the half-hour before pickup, to ease any possible uncertainty, and text upon their arrival (which averages about 10 minutes early).  Michael and his drivers are friendly, courteous, kind, and helpful, and their vehicles are clean and luxurious.  I use them for ALL my business travel (at least one trip a month), as does my wife, and I have recommended them to numerous colleagues (whose experiences mirror our own).  I also use them for personal travel as well - even in instances where I could just drive to the airport and park - because the experience is so positive.  Over the last two years I have gotten to know Michael well, and he is an honest, dedicated, high-integrity local entrepreneur.  I encourage everyone who needs a lift to the airport - or transport around or out of town in the Birmingham area (e.g., dinner dates out, etc.) - to use his service.  Anyone wishing to verify THIS review as legitimate is more than welcome to contact me - I am Dr. Steven McCornack, and I am a Professor in the Department of Communication Studies at the University of Alabama Birmingham.

resp.text:
Dr. Mccornack

Thank you for the passionate defense of our company. Your loyalty and continued patronage is very appreciated.

Michael Adlesperger
Alabama Sedan

Masry was right on time (Cab #308). The cab was clean and didn't reek of smoke. Silver Cab has been my first pleasant taxi experience in Birmingham, AL and I've used them all. Thank you, Silver Cab...don't change anything!

name: Vincent Callaway
text: The driver Moe was excellent and his service was friendly. I recommend using them if your ever in Birmingham. You will receive top notch service and quality that you don't find in most companies today.

name: Jessica Hall
text: I will never be using this cab company in the future. If the driver of #309, on the morning of 03/18/2019, was any indication of Silver Cab's commitment to safety, I'll would just as soon walk. The cabby in #309 was impatient and reckless beyond belief. From speeding, to tailgating. Not even a courtesy turn signal. He nearly sideswiped several cars changing lanes. He ran one poor fella, in a black Nissan, off the road, attempting to change lanes and squeeze between two cars. The black Nissan got behind him and looked as though he was attempting to get a picture of his tag with his cell phone. When the Nissan would get close enough, the driver of #309 would slam his brakes and shoot a bird at him.... No.... Will never use this company...

resp.text: Sorry for the bad experience. I would be very upset as well. Driver 309 is no longer with us. It is one of the hardest businesses to know who is a good or bad driver until they work for the company. My apologies and Thank You.

name: Baron F
text: I first called Yellow Cab. The person on the line was rude and refused to help me because I was calling from an out of town area code. Silver Cab was the next call and should have been my first. Great to work with and on time. Yuri (my driver) was extremely friendly. I'll use them whenever I need a cab and I am in Birmingham.

name: Jennifer Kersh
text: I love this company, and have used them regularly to travel for work for years. my husband and mom also use them, never had any issues. they are always on time, professional, cabs are clean and the drivers are friendly.

name: Bettyjo Deslauries
text: I'm a driver for silver cab n this is a very responsible n dedicated company to b working for. Clean cabs n great drivers n the best boss ever. Hope u will ride with this company.. God bless..

name: Jessica Jackson
text: Mo was my driver and he is absolutely amazing! He is more than just a cab driver, but a friend! So happy with silver cab company, will definitely use them again. I would recommend them to anyone! Thank you for being so prompt and attentive to my needs.

name: J L
text: Mohammad was extremely polite and professional. His cab was impeccable. The ride was a great experience and I will go out of my way to utilize his service any time I am in the Birmingham area!

name: Todd Halcomb
text: This review is for Betty Jo. My experience with her was awesome. She was very friendly and respectful. She was early and waited on me. My trip even run longer than expected and she did not get upset. She made sure there would be a driver waiting for the other customer.

name: April Holderfield
text: This is for Mohammad Harb with Silver Cab Co.. I greatly appreciate you coming out of your way to come and get me and take me to the hospital today. It was truly a great experience. I highly recommend using Mohammad with Silver Cab.

name: Chelsey Gilliam
text: By far the best cab experience I've ever had in Birmingham or anywhere else in the country.  From the first phone call through several different pickups and drop offs, our driver Mike was incredibly prompt courteous and professional.  the extraordinary level of customer service made a special night all the more special for us.

name: Chris Stewart
text: I met the owner over 10 years ago and he has ALWAYS been 1st Class!  He is prompt, courteous, and a very safe driver!  I use their service about 5-7 times a month and have NEVER been disappointed!  I know that I will always use SILVER CAB!!

name: Masry Eastern food
text: Silver Cab actually KNOWS the area, will actually call and let you know how far they are from picking you up and show up on time!  Very reliable, very dependable and the level of service top notch!

name: Larry Elliott
text: Had an excellent experience with Silver Cab. Betty Jo was very professional. She was early and I was able to get to my appointment earlier than expected which was a plus. I will call her when I need a ride again.

name: Regis Ferrie
text: Seder was the most helpful driver I have ever death with.  We had a situation with our grandson that was out of town and needed to get to the bus station.  Seder went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure our grandson got on the bus to us safely and out of a terrible situation.  He made it happen!!  Would recommend this company to anyone!!!!

name: Joe Leal
text: Mohamaad runs an excellent company. He is very dependable and if he isn't available he assigns another driver no matter what time of day. He is always friendly respectful and upbeat. Best cab experience I ever had. I always use him.

name: Rosemarie Bates
text: JOHN CAR #301 is the BEST! He saved me and my job after Yellow Cab left me stranded. He was genuinely concerned about my situation and was there to get me pronto! When I called he was quick to respond and let me know down to the minute his arrival time. I have him saved in my contacts as The Best Taxi Ever because he is!! Thank you John!! You are an angel.

text: Greatest, Cab Ride ever.... I'm telling everyone to ride with Silver Cab... Friendly ,drivers ,clean cabs, great ride. A great day

text: The waot was too long

name: Derek L

text: Best cab service in Birmingham. After having numerous problems with Birmingham Yellow Cab, I reached out to the Silver Cab company which connected me directly with my driver as opposed to a dispatch. Mike, my driver, was very friendly and prompt in his arrival. His vehicle was clean, the meter was running (ensuring I received an honest fare), and he was respectable to me as a customer...which is unfortunately nothing I can say about many of the other cab rides I've received from other companies both in Birmingham or elsewhere.

Pleasant right on time car smells good! Very nice decoration! I would love to ride again!!! Me and my son had a awesome ride!

text: My first time taking a cab and using this company and I must say I was very very pleased with the service. Ethan was very nice, showed up to my house before time and got me to my destination way before time. Thank you silver cab. P.s. Ethan deserves a raise.

Thanx silver car for another dissapointment in life!! I'll never call again and I've heard good things about your company! The automated thing is no way to run a cab company!!!!

text: There really is no reason to call any other cab company in Birmingham when you can call Mike with Silver Cab.  While on a business trip from NJ, Mike was timely, friendly, and made us feel right at home so naturally we continued to call him throughout our trip when we needed a cab.  Other companies in the area were not responsive, even hung up on me (AKA Yellow Cab) and it was a complete 180 having Silver Cab drive us where we needed to go.  He even delayed ending his own shift to make sure we got back to our hotel.  Do yourself a favor and call Mike, there really is no one better!

text: Don't try to schedule if you need an early pick up time. They told me to call someone else because they would charge me a fee for getting up early since I wasn't going very far. They didn't even care that I would need a return trip a few hours later. Guess they don't want or need my business.

resp.text: We found out which driver did that and he is no longer with Silver Cab. Thank You for your review.

name: kathy alfaro
text: I just had an emergency flight for my son last minute and I called silver cab and got BETTY a new driver and new to Birmingham area. She was not able to make it quickly but she swiftly made arrangements right away to get my son to airport on time versus just calling me back to let me know she couldn't make and he miss his flight. I have another son still in area and already plan to use Betty and others at silver cab as my GO TO for local and airport runs. Great job Betty!! My son is boarding his flight as I write this review!!! Glad u came on board w silver cab and know u will have many more reviews such as my own.

name: Byanca Jones
text: I called this morning and a guy took my phone number and he never asked for an address or nothing!!! I called back an hour later and no one knew what the hell was going on!!! Just horrible service all around! They even told me to call another cab service!!! So I did.

resp.text: Out apologies for any inconvenience this have caused you. Thank You.

name: Emilio Paschetto
text: I have been working with Cab #304 (Mr. Masry) that I highly recommend: always always punctual if not early on the appointment, very kind and educated, suggested good places and was always available... Perfect job thanks to him

text: Best taxi company ever! We are from Chicago my son's flight was delayed and the rental car company he had reserved closed. I called and they had a taxi there within minutes. Driver Ahmed I think he was #304 called to let me know he picked my son up from the airport and also texted me once he dropped him off at the hotel! (My son is 19 and on his first trip out of state alone for work). He went above and beyond

name: Ernest Chomicki
text: SO... I'm a Forensics/Debate Coach.  We were in Birmingham with my three students for Nationals and since I don't drive, we relied on cabs.  I can honestly say, that this company and especially Betty Jo pretty much saved our lives!  We got to our tournament high schools in excellent time, my students kept asking for her to pick us up since they always had such a fun experience with her, and this is important, when she couldn't make a run to come get us, she ensured that someone would!  I don't think I have EVER had that kind of excellent service from a cab company; definitely not here in Milwaukee, WI.  If you need dependability, and a pleasant experience, then this is the company to call.  Oh, and the price wasn't too bad either.

name: QWEEZY “QSI” H
text: This is officially my 50th time taking this amazing cab company. I used Silvercab to help me go through Hoover all the time. I was never denied, cabs always smelled wonderful and I've met every single cab driver in the roster,  and every single one has a unique personality that makes me look away from my phone just to admire it.

name: Gregg Mitchell
text: Sucks

name: Philip Barbour
text: I was turning in a rental at a business on 3rd Avenue South and needed a cab to take me home. The Silver Cab reviews looked promising and so I called. The automated recording said my call would be transferred to a driver. It was. I gave the gentleman the address where I needed to be picked up. Everything was fine until I told him my home destination address on Red Mountain. Suddenly the driver became a dispatcher and said, "we have no drivers in your area."  Really?  No drivers in the downtown Birmingham vicinity?  He thought it was just going to be too short a fare and suggested I call Yellow Cab. I did. I tipped $10 on a $10 fare. That disregard for me ensures I will never call Silver Cab again.

name: Chris Taylor
text: Betty Jo was my driver and she is awesome. I would definitely recommend them. Thanks.

name: Rachel Mascari
text: My cab drive driver Mohammed Harb was so great. He was amazing, very nice and so helpful. I would ask for him every time!

name: g man
text:
Once I let it go, twice I have to rate.

I had to find other options to the airport as Silver Cab drivers were not able to show up on time.
4am pickup means, at my house at 4am. Does not mean text me at 4am that you are on your way? ?
For normal operating hours 7am-6pm they are probably ok, not early mornings, unreliable.

resp.text: Would you please provide us with the silver cab number or the name of the driver? If not can you please describe the driver. I hate that you had a bad experience with silver cab more than once. My apologies for any inconvenience this may have caused you. I promise you we will improve our service next time to all customers because of people like you who deserve better service. Thank You. Harb. Owner of silver cab.

text: MoHammad was absolutely delightful, kind and knowledgable of the area.  Thank you!!   Took me awhile how to figure out how to leave a review but finally did because the service was that amazing.

text: They did not show up for pickup. Received confirmation via text but no one called that they were running late or not showing up.

resp.text: Driver called, texted and emailed you the day before but you never confirmed back. Please you may call me personally at 205-585-0132 for a free ride to or from the airport. I believe your story and I believe customers are always right.

text: Used Silver Cab from our hotel in Hover to the Birmingham Airport.  Our driver, Tameko was right on time and greeted us with a smile.  The ride to the airport was wondeful and would not hesitate to use Silver Cab again.

name: Michael Fick
text: I booked cab. Cab called me . I texted driver taxi. I am deaf. Ring call me. I said deaf. Driver cab texted me said here your taxi cab. Driver nice man. Thanks driver man .

name: Katrina Miner
text: I had Masry cab#304. He was great! I was running late, he waiting for me & rushed me to the airport.

name: Stephanie Wilson
text:
As a visitor to Birmingham, I relied on the natives for feedback regarding services for early transport to the airport. Despite the good reviews for Silver Cab, they insisted that taxis in the city are universally unreliable. Cabs simply don't show up, they said. Inconvenience your friends; do whatever it takes to avoid cab service, because you would be lucky for them to arrive an hour after the scheduled time.

I was so relieved to experience Silver Cab as an exception. When I first called to schedule the pick-up, no one answered, which honestly didn't leave a great first impression. And even after they called back to take the request, I wasn't convinced they would ever show. But luckily Rob texted 30 minutes before the pick-up to let me know he was on his way and arrived 10 minutes early. The ride was pleasant, driver polite, and cab clean, but most importantly Silver Cab exceeded expectations by simply arriving on-time.

I hope the word spreads that Silver Cab is, indeed, a reliable transport option in Birmingham!

name: Shane Rathel
text: Betty Jo is awesome!. Betty Jo never showed back up........Now we don't have a ride....

name: Megan Malone
text: Betty Joe is amazing, I scheduled a 3:45 am pick up time and was nervous about how early the pick up was, but she was there early and so friendly! Definitely recommend!

name: Great Awesome
text: Betty jo awas great! I eas surprised that a woman was coming to get me which made me feel safe so late  at night.  She warm friendly and interesting.  I recommend her anytime!

name: Howard Kersh
text: I travel for work and this is the only company that I trust to get me to the airport on time. I have been using Silver Cab for about two years now and I fly about four times a month. They have never been late, the car is always clean, and they are very professional.

name: Scott Vandenberghe
text:
SO many problems- last time I don’t use Uber.

Landed in Birmingham and decided to try a taxi since they were right there.  Took a 5 minute trip that cost me $20.  It was a $16.50 fate but he had no change.   What cabbie doesn’t have change?. That fare used to be $12 or $6 with a recent uber.

The cab was smelly (not being picky here-it stunk), window wouldn’t roll down to offer any help, heat was blasting (it was 65 outside), driver didn’t offer help with bag, rude, etc, etc, etc.

I wil never use a cab again. I should’ve known.

resp.text: Are you sure it was a Silver Cab? Please call us for more details about the driver 205-585-0132. It was 30 degrees here last night.

name: Tricia R.
text:
Absolutely fabulous cab service.  When others (Yellow Cab) wouldn't pick us up, they did!  The cab was one of the cleanest I used and I would highly recommend.

BTW, Yellow Cab - The WORST cab service in Birmingham!  I stayed at the Sheraton Birmingham and even thought they have a sign out front for their services, don't bother.  They have no working knowledge of the area and are too bothered to show up.

Silver Cab actually KNOWS the area, will actually call and let you know how far they are from picking you up and show up on time!  Very reliable, very dependable and the level of service top notch!

name: Jaismine Chatman
text: I usually get a cab to go home when i dont have a way home and i will pay $30 but I request a silver cab today and I damn near paid $40 to get home ....I will not be calling y'all again

resp.text: You may have used Uber or Left for a cheaper price. Our prices are always the same regardless of the demand. It is 2$ per mile plus a 3$ to start the meter. Out apologies for your bad experience. Please give us another chance. Thank You.

name: Kayla MacNeil
text: Scheduled an early morning pickup to the airport and no one showed up. Tried to call and check when they were 20 minutes late and no one answered. Called an Uber instead.

resp.text: I wish you called our main line 205-701-2222 instead of calling the driver who was assigned to you. All Silver cab team was up that morning. We could have send you another cab in less time than Uber. We are all sorry about any inconvenience this may caused you and hope that you will give us a second chance.

name: michaela tillery

name: Kaspr
text: BEWARE WHEN CALLING THIS COMPANY!!! There is a driver by the name of Terance who is a total creep and crook!!!!when he is on the clockhe does not run the meter and charges extra!!! His cab always smells like straight BO, weed and cigarettes  and he drives extremely reckless and like a maniac!! Always speeding and all over the roads!!! He regularly drives around in his own personal silver crown vic and company cab while he is off the clock and poses like he is on the clock and charges extra money on your tab!!!! And when you call him out on his driving all he says is chill out and if you ask why his meter is running he says it does not work! And when you're a regular cab rider and know the total of what your ride will be before hand, and ask why you've been charged extra he gets rude and makes crazy excuses and when you tell him you cant pay that amount because you only brought the amount you normally pay silver cab to go that distance, he will tell you he will take sexual payments to make up the difference of what you supposedly owe him!!!! I was a loyal silver cab customer but three times of ending up in the vehicle with this guy has caused me to changes companies of what cab i get in because this guy is a dangerous predator and drug addict and i refuse to be made feel the way he made me feel again!!!!! So disrespected!!! So violated!!!  I felt extremely uncomfortable and unsafe!!!!

resp.text: Ms. Berkey,  I am deeply grieved to learn of this behavior happening in a Silver Cab. Rest assured, had I not terminated this contractor's lease agreement the day before hand your review,  he would be terminated for this kind of behavior. We do not tolerate behavior like this for any reason. I know it is hard to give a company a second chance after an experience like this, but I hope you will consider trying Silver Cab one more time.

My truck broke down yesterday,  and I desperately needed to run some errands today. Dunh Dunha Daaaaa.... Silver Cab to the rescue. Yuri "The Russian" arrived in Cab #305 right when he said he would.
Now it's important to understand that I hardly ever use cabs, so I asked him how it worked. He explained everything to me, very patiently, and very professionally.  The ride was safe and the environment professional.  I almost felt like I was in a limo.
If all of Silver Cabs employees are as awesome as Yuri, then in the words of "Daym Drops".    Silver Cab, &, Cab 305 Get A 5 ALL Day Son!

name: Vanessa Steinkamp Norfleet
text: I had to use Bayside often after being released from the hospital while not able to drive. Overall the service was excellent. The drivers arrive in a timely manner and are courteous. As to be expected, some drivers exceed others in their willingness to open a door, help you get in and out, etc. The two stellar driver's, for my experience, were Tom and Danny. Both are exceptional people and good drivers. I will continue to use Bayside but will ask if either Tom or Danny are available first. Thank you, Bayside, for being prompt, courteous and helpful in my time of need.

text: Great service! Great drivers & receptionist & very friendly! On time every time!

name: Appledroplarry
text: Outrageous rates. Gouging. Avoid this company.

resp.text: Our metered rates are on file and regulated by the Alabama Public Service Commission.  The meter is there to prevent gouging.  We do not alter our rates or add hidden fees.
